packages.name: Eco-Friendly Adventure
packages.description: Experience outdoor adventures while minimizing environmental impact through sustainable practices.

packages.name: Green City Break
packages.description: Explore eco-friendly cities with accommodations and activities focused on sustainability.

packages.name: Organic Farm Stay
packages.description: Stay on an organic farm and learn about sustainable agriculture and local food production.

packages.name: Wildlife Conservation Safari
packages.description: Join a safari focused on wildlife conservation, supporting local ecosystems and species protection.

packages.name: Sustainable Sailing
packages.description: Sail on eco-friendly vessels and participate in activities promoting marine conservation.
